testcase.classname: feature to test the Demoblaze login functionality
testcase.name: To validate if the login functionality is working
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on Demoblaze login page.........................................passed When user enters the username and password in respective text boxes.........passed And user hits login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page successfully........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Demoblaze login functionality
testcase.name: To validate that Login functionality is not working while providing both blank credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on Demoblaze login page.........................................passed When user will NOT enter the username and password in respective text boxes.passed And user hits login button..................................................passed Then error message should be displayed to the user..........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Demoblaze login functionality
testcase.name: To validate that Login functionality is not working while providing any one invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on Demoblaze login page.........................................passed When user will enter only the username and NOT password in respective text boxes.passed And user hits login button..................................................passed Then error message should be displayed to the user..........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Demoblaze login functionality
testcase.name: To validate that Login functionality should not be working while providing both invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on Demoblaze login page.........................................passed When user will enter invalid username and inavalid password in respective text boxes.passed And user hits login button..................................................passed Then error message should be displayed to the user..........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Demoblaze login functionality
testcase.name: To validate that Login functionality that user should not be able to perform copy/paste operations on Password field
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on Demoblaze login page.........................................passed When user will enter username and perform copy or paste operation on password field.passed And user hits login button..................................................passed Then error message should be displayed to the user..........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Demoblaze login functionality
testcase.name: To validate that Login functionality should not be working while providing credentials beyond the specified length
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on Demoblaze login page.........................................passed When user will enter username and password beyond the specified limit in respective text boxes.passed And user hits login button..................................................passed Then error message should be displayed to the user..........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Demoblaze login functionality
testcase.name: To validate that Login functionality should not be working while providing credentials below the specified length
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on Demoblaze login page.........................................passed When user will enter username and password below the specified limit in respective text boxes.passed And user hits login button..................................................passed Then error message should be displayed to the user..........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Demoblaze login functionality
testcase.name: To validate that close button is working or not on login page
